titleStmt.title: Querela geometrica, or, Geometry's complaint of the injuries lately received from Mr. Thomas VVhite in his late tract entituled, Tutela geometrica in the end you have some places at large out of Mr. White's Tutela, and Gulden's Centrobaryca, reprinted, and faithfully translated into English.
titleStmt.author: White, Thomas, 1593-1676. Chrysaspis. English & Latin. Selections.
Guldin, Paul, 1577-1643. De centro gravitatis. English & Latin. Selections.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
